sn45.31:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong practice and the right practice.
sn45.31:4.6: wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong samādhi.
sn45.31:4.8: This is called the wrong practice.
sn45.31:4.11: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.31:4.13: This is called the right practice.”
